News.headline: Hospitality Special: Dagenham & Redbridge vs Bromley
News.page_title: Hospitality Special: Dagenham & Redbridge vs Bromley
News.URL_keywords: Hospitality Special: Dagenham & Redbridge vs Bromley
News.short_description: Don't miss out on our Hospitality special for our evening game against Bromley deadline to book is 4pm today; tickets from £25.00!
News.description:
Watch the Daggers in style this coming Tuesday with a special on our hospitality package for our Vanarama National League fixture against Bromley FC, with tickets at just £30.00 for adults and £25.00 for concessions (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to watch the Daggers in style this February. The match day hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 7:45pm with our guests in the sponsors lounge sitting down at 6pm

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 0208 592 1549 Ext. 33.

Deadline to Book is today at 4pm, don't miss out!
